user_query: Of all the jungle cruises you could take in the Amazon, this one is undoubtedly the cheapest, but also the most thrilling. Heads up! Coming through! Look out! Marauders! Natives! Ladies and gentlemen, the moment you've all been waiting for, the backside of water. Stays wonder of the world. Anjana, Frankie boy. Mr. Nila, please don't call me that. I'm going to keep your engine. I got my money, then you get it back. Frank gives me money. Please go away. I have a lot of money. We're headed upriver to Lágrimas de Cristal. I gotta be honest, it's not a fun vacation, but you're gonna beg me to turn back. Ten thousand to bring you there. Live? Dead? It's fifteen thousand. Why should I pay more? Dead? Dead I'd have to carry you. That's a lot harder, lady. Here we go. It's impossible.

entities.entity_description: Frank는 아마존에서 정글 크루즈를 운영하는 인물로, 저렴하지만 스릴 넘치는 투어를 제공한다
Mr. Nila는 Frank에게 "Frankie boy"라고 불리는 것을 싫어하며, Frank의 엔진을 담보로 잡고 있는 인물이다
Lágrimas de Cristal은 아마존 상류에 위치한 목적지로, 여행하기 쉽지 않은 곳이다

relationships.relationship_description: Frank는 Mr. Nila에게 돈을 갚아야 엔진을 돌려받을 수 있는 관계이다
Anjana는 Frank를 "Frankie boy"라고 부르며 친근하게 대한다
Frank는 승객을 Lágrimas de Cristal까지 데려다주는 크루즈 운영자이다

LÁGRIMAS DE CRISTAL.description: LÁGRIMAS DE CRISTAL -> LÁGRIMAS DE CRISTAL
